title: Project Management-Based Development and Transition Strategies for Online Science Courses

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in scientific disciplines and proficiency in basic online learning tools
context.additional_context: Situations where corporate managers/leaders transition existing face-to-face science education to online or blended formats, or develop new programs while applying project management methodologies

learning_goals: Learners can establish a development plan for online science lectures using a project management framework
Learners can apply an online content design process based on the ADDIE model to convert science educational materials
Learners can operate blended learning environments through the use of a learning management system (LMS) and design of digital assessment tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
